nodes.text: Hali Kadir was a female Human from the planet Zakuul who served in the Knights of Zakuul during the era in which the Eternal Empire ruled over the galaxy. An elite Knight who held the title of Paladin, Kadir wore dark armor and wielded a blue double-bladed lightsaber in battle. She was stationed aboard the Star Fortress over the planet Belsavis, and died around 3631 BBY when the Star Fortress was invaded and destroyed.

Hali Kadir was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Knights of the Fallen Empire, a 2015 Digital Expansion. She is one of four possible Paladins that can spawn during the Belsavis version of the "The Star Fortress" Flashpoint; as the Star Fortress is destroyed with all hands aboard, this article assumes that Kadir died either in battle or when the battle station exploded.
